text: Joan Solano Bustamante (born 5 May 1953) is a Spanish rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Spain Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Joan Solano
